QuestData.Title: Promontory Point
QuestData.Description: $n, I need you to get this information to Legionnaire Nazgrim on Promontory Point. He's up there to the northwest with Erunak Stonespeaker and those Earthen Ring people.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Legionnaire Nazgrim on Promontory Point in Vashj'ir.
QuestData.RewardText: If it weren't you saying it, I wouldn't believe what that troublesome goblin has to say. This is troubling indeed, but I think our Earthen Ring friends have a few ideas.$B$BAnd now that you're here....
